entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
